appDescription.message: Report your development progress by auto-fetching your Git activity for a selected period
appDescription.description: A brief description of what the extension does.

disableLabel.description: Label for the toggle switch to disable the extension.

enableLabel.description: Label for the toggle switch to enable the extension.

projectNameLabel.description: Label for the project name input field.

projectNamePlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the project name input.

githubUsernameLabel.description: Label for the GitHub username input field.

githubUsernamePlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the GitHub username input.

contributionsLabel.description: Label for the date range selection.

last7DaysLabel.description: Radio button option for the last 7 days.

last1DayLabel.description: Radio button option for the last 1 day.

startDateLabel.description: Label for the start date picker.

endDateLabel.description: Label for the end date picker.

showOpenClosedLabel.description: Label for the checkbox to show open/closed status on PRs/issues.

blockersLabel.message: What is blocking you from making progress?
blockersLabel.description: Label for the input field for blockers.

blockersPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the blockers input field.

scrumReportLabel.description: Heading for the generated scrum report.

settingsOrgNameLabel.description: Label for the organization name input in settings.

settingsOrgNamePlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the organization name input.

setButton.description: Text for the 'Set' button for the organization.

githubTokenLabel.description: Label for the GitHub token input.

githubTokenPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the GitHub token input.

showCommitsLabel.message: Show commits made within date range in Open PRs
showCommitsLabel.description: Label for the checkbox to show commits in open PRs.

cacheTTLLabel.description: Label for the cache time-to-live input.

cacheTTLPlaceholder.message: Write Cache TTL in minutes (Default 10 minutes)
cacheTTLPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the cache TTL input.

refreshDataButton.description: Text for the button to refresh data, ignoring the cache.

refreshDataInfo.message: Use this button to fetch fresh data immediately.
refreshDataInfo.description: Informational text below the refresh button.

viewCodeButton.description: Text for the button to view the source code on GitHub.

reportIssueButton.description: Text for the button to report an issue on GitHub.

generatingButton.description: Text shown on the generate button when the report is being created.

copiedButton.description: Text shown on the copy button after a successful copy.

orgChangedMessage.message: Organization changed. Click Generate button to fetch the GitHub activities.
orgChangedMessage.description: Message shown in the report area after the organization is changed.

cacheClearedMessage.message: Cache cleared successfully. Click "Generate Report" to fetch fresh data.
cacheClearedMessage.description: Message shown in the report area after the cache is cleared.

cacheClearedButton.description: Text on the refresh button after the cache is cleared.

extensionDisabledMessage.message: Extension is disabled. Enable it from the options to generate scrum reports.
extensionDisabledMessage.description: Message shown when the extension is disabled.

notePoint1.message: The PRs fetched are based on the most recent review by any contributor. If you reviewed a PR 10 days ago and someone else reviewed it 2 days ago, it will still appear in your activity for the past week.
notePoint1.description: First point in the notes section.

notePoint2.message: Please note that some discrepancies may occur in the generated SCRUM. We recommend manually reviewing and editing the report to ensure accuracy before sharing.
notePoint2.description: Second point in the notes section.

noteSeeIssue.description: Link text for the GitHub issue in the notes.
